pages.text: while a witch cauldron can be used to make much more incredible brews, some witches may at times prefer to use more subtle brews.$(br)all brews in this entry can be obtained via other means, though the witch cauldron may allow you to make them stronger.$(br)mundane brews fabricated in the witches cauldron use slightly different ingredients.

pages.title: absorption
pages.text: applies temporary extra-health.

pages.title: blindness
pages.text: drastically reduces the target's field of vision, darkening everything around it.

pages.title: fire resistance
pages.text: grants immunity to flame.

pages.title: glowing
pages.text: makes the target glow obnoxiously.

pages.title: haste
pages.text: increases mining speed.

pages.title: hunger
pages.text: applies a hunger effect.

pages.title: instant health
pages.text: instantly heals a flat amount of health, using the healing properties of garlic.

pages.title: instant damage
pages.text: instantly damages a flat amount of health, harnessing the deadly energies of cypress.

pages.title: invisibility
pages.text: makes the target invisible.

pages.title: jump boost
pages.text: jump boost is self-explanatory.

pages.title: levitation
pages.text: slowly ascends the target into the sky.

pages.title: mining fatigue
pages.text: mining fatigue makes the target hit much slower.

pages.title: nausea
pages.text: induces sickness by disorienting the target.

pages.title: night vision
pages.text: carrots are good for your eyes.

pages.title: poison
pages.text: fills the target's blood with deadly toxin.

pages.title: regeneration
pages.text: by utilizing the life energies from juniper, regeneration quickens the healing process when applied.

pages.title: resistance
pages.text: reduces damage.

pages.title: slow falling
pages.text: makes the target fall gently, like a feather.

pages.title: slowness
pages.text: reduces the target's movement speed.

pages.title: speed
pages.text: increases movement speed, using the energizing qualities of sugar cane.

pages.title: strength
pages.text: using the powers of oak, this increases damage output.

pages.title: water breathing
pages.text: allows breathing in water.

pages.title: weakness
pages.text: reduces the target's damage.$(br2)you may also use a brown mushroom for this.

pages.title: wither
pages.text: gradually reduces the target's health.
